name: Exhibition of Memories
description:
Exhibition of Memories is a horror themed first person shooter.
Traverse through the museum and hunt your quarry.
Preserve your equipment or fumble in the dark.





WASD - Arrow keys : Movement
Left Shift : Walk
Left Control : Crouch
Number Keys : Weapon Slots
Left Click : Primary Attack
Right Click : Secondary Attack
Tab: Inventory
E : Interact
Q : Heal Slot
R: Reload
F : Flashlight




If you encounter any issues with the game please feel free to reach out.

Thank you for taking the time to play/browse this game!
Current Version : 1.0
